name: Hampton Inn Ann Arbor - North

reviews.text: My stay at Hampton Inn Ann Arbor - North was fantastic! Friendly staff, great location, clean comfortable rooms and beds. Very nice continental breakfast and great coffee. This hotel is located close to downtown Ann Arbor, which is just a short drive away.
reviews.title: Fantastic Hotel

reviews.text: Stayed here in February for two nights before the Super Bowl. Rooms were clean, beds were comfortable, and the continental breakfast provided was great. The best part about this hotel was the staff. From the front desk to the breakfast server, everyone was warm and friendly and seemed genuinely excited to have us staying there. The front desk even let me use their computer to get directions to downtown Detroit on mapquest. I would stay here again if I return to Michigan. It was a great value for the price.
reviews.title: Great Staff
disappointing
reviews.text: Smallest hotel bathroom I have ever seen. The vanity is like the one in your first cheap apartment. Horrible.

reviews.title: very decent
reviews.text: The swimming pool was as cold as a mountain lake.

reviews.title: Great Night Sleep at an Affordable Price
reviews.text: I recently stayed at the Hampton Inn North and was impressed by the friendliness of the staff and the cleanliness of the rooms. The continental breakfast that was included offered a wide variety of food and there was lots of it! I would definitely stay there the next time I go to Ann Arbor and I will recommend it to anyone coming to the area.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed March 2007, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: This is a typical Hampton Inn, by which I mean it is clean, comfortable, reasonably priced and uninspiring.
reviews.title: Typical Hampton Inn

reviews.text: The food, staff and accommodations were quite adequate, as they usually are with Hampton Inns.
reviews.title: great stay..wonderful staff!

likes.liked: — the updated rooms and the staff

reviews.text: The location might be an issue for you. It's in the Ann Arbor suburbs, in what is essentially an office park, with nothing to walk to except an Applebees. Very dull, but convenient for driving to the university or into town.
reviews.title: Great if you're visiting University of Michigan

reviews.text: In the past several years, our family has stayed in many Hampton Inns and by far, this was the best one yet! Though certain features are always the same, there is a vast difference in the quality of the locations. This one seemed newly renovated with very clean rooms and public spaces, lovely furnishings, comfortable beds and flat screen tv's. But more importantly, the staff was amazing! They held cookies for us, because they were still baking them when we were going out. We decided at the last minute not to stay an extra night and they made our checking out experience stress free.
reviews.title: Perfect for visit to U of M

likes.liked: — close to UofM, walk to restaurant, nice staff, 30 min drive to airport

reviews.text: This location is very convenient if you are visiting University of Michigan. It's about a 10 minute drive to the main campus(it would be shorter but there are so many traffic lights!) and to the college town.
reviews.title: Very Nice

likes.disliked: — Bed linens did not fit the mattress

reviews.text: The hotel is perfectly located for the business traveller. It's near a major highway artery into Ann Arbor. If you need to visit North Campus of the U of Mich or local businesses, it's a great place to stay. There is free wierless internet service that gave NO problems connecting. The beds are a little small (FULL) but comfortable. The workout room is good if you are only looking for a cardio workout. There is a pool and hot tub area.
reviews.title: Good Basic Hotel - nice cardio equipment
Will come back
reviews.text: There is a 24-hour drug store and restaurant on the property for late night meals or emergencies.

reviews.title: Best hotel I have stayed in
reviews.text: Most comfortable beds of ANY hotel/motel we have stayed in. Slept as good as if we were at home. Very clean and queit room. Excellent continental breakfast. Will definitely rebook a reservation for 2006. Easy access to/from Highway.

reviews.title: Booked Online?
reviews.text: I spent a week with my wife, sister-in-law and a friend in a two bedroom suite. First of all this is the cleanest hotel I have ever stayed in. The suite is furnished very well, the kitchen has all the items you may need; and we never felt like we are away from home.

reviews.title: thank goodness it was only for one night
reviews.text: I booked my room prior to my stay to take advantage of my "Honors" points and receive a free nights stay. I was in town on business and could have also used a room discount from my host company. After checking out and going back home, I realized that I'd been charged the full amount and no "Honors" points were deducted. My Visa was charged the full amount for 2 rooms. My employer has asked me to take full advantage of all savings while on the road, as I usually do but this has changed my mind on redemption of travel savings. Other than one other occasion can I remember a mess up at Hampton but I am seriously thinking of a new hotel change to do business with.

aka: Hampton Inn Ann Arbor - North Hotel
description: Welcome to the Hampton Inn Ann Arbor-North hotel, ideally located for your visit to Michigan universities, area companies and other attractions. Detroit Metropolitan Wayne County Airport is only 25 miles from our hotel in Ann Arbor, MI. Situated northeast of downtown Ann Arbor, our north Ann Arbor hotel is minutes from the University of Michigan North Campus, Cleary University, the Thomas M. Cooley School of Law, Concordia University and Eastern Michigan University.Stay with us when you take campus tours or attend football games, graduation and other events. Stroll through the Matthaei Botanical Gardens and Nichols Arboretum. Browse the jewelry stores, gift shops and markets, or enjoy the district’s vibrant nightlife. Visit the Ann Arbor Hands-On Museum. Drive to Detroit to explore the history of the automobile industry and to enjoy cultural and family-friendly attractions. Surrounded by many area companies, our hotel in Ann Arbor, MI is only a mile from Domino’s World Headquarters.Reserve one of our 129 guest rooms featuring king and double beds, and a hospitality suite. Connect to free WiFi to surf the web or check email. Get some work done at the desk or set up your laptop on the convenient lap desk. Watch your favorite cable programs on the 32-inch HDTV. Ask about additional amenities such as a mini-refrigerator and microwave. We look forward to welcoming you to Hampton Inn Ann Arbor – North, a great choice among hotels in Ann Arbor, MI.
